Articles.Content:
I am not getting thermal power when I put an electric generator on the fission reactor ????

sorry, I de-railed my previous post ;(

You should probably post this either in the relevant mod's own thread, in the "Support (modded installs)" sub-forum or in the "General Add-on Affairs" sub-forum (and also supply a log and mod list as described in the "How to get support" sticky thread in the Support sub-forum).
Tou need radiators... Without, the reactor will stop, otherwise it will explode
I have put the (folding) heat radiators on and it still does not work!
Bump! as I still can not get power to work.
A few things.. What mod is this, does it support 1.0.4 and why aren't you posting in that mod's thread?
Moving this mod-related question over to General Add-On Affairs.
